long_description: The REI Recycled Polyester liner socks are made with Nature Spun(TM) fabric, a post-consumer recycled polyester blend. Wear under hiking socks to reduce friction and help prevent blisters. Wicks away moisture so feet stay dry and comfortable. Fabric blend is designed to be quick-drying and form-fitting. Knit heel and toe pockets create a comfortable fit. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The REI Recycled Polyester liner socks are made with Nature Spun(TM) fabric, a post-consumer recycled polyester blend.
